name: MetricCardTen
description: Job listing style metric cards with title, subtitle, category indicator, value, and optional footer buttons.

description.example: Join our team and help shape the future of AI

title.note: Main title displayed at top of card, truncates if too long

subtitle.example: San Francisco, CA · Full-time · Remote eligible
subtitle.note: Secondary info like location, type, or details

category.note: Category label with dot indicator, truncates on overflow

value.note: Value displayed on bottom right (salary, price, etc.)

buttons.note: Optional buttons in footer section with accent background

propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ id: string, title: string, subtitle: string, category: string, value: string, buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}> }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <MetricCardTen metrics={[{ id: '1', title: 'Senior Software Engineer, Platform', subtitle: 'San Francisco, CA · Full-time · Remote eligible', category: 'Engineering', value: '$185K – $265K', buttons: [{ text: 'Apply Now', href: '#' }] }, { id: '2', title: 'Product Designer, Enterprise', subtitle: 'New York, NY · Full-time', category: 'Design', value: '$145K – $195K', buttons: [{ text: 'Apply Now', href: '#' }] }, { id: '3', title: 'Data Scientist, ML Platform', subtitle: 'Remote · Full-time', category: 'Data Science', value: '$168K – $238K', buttons: [{ text: 'Apply Now', href: '#' }] }]} title="Open Positions" description="Join our team and help shape the future of AI" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" animationType="slide-up" />
dont: Do not use more than 12 items
